page.title: 12HEALTH, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {Library cont'd. housed in a former school building. The library is open to the public two days a week Mondays and Thursdays. It is also available specifically for school classes on Thursday mornings. The library is well used by residents. {Health Centre. Three Doctors work from this Centre. There is also an Anti-Natal Clinic, a Family Planning Clinic and a Health Visitor at the Centre. The Doctors are responsible for the villages of Lynemouth, Ellington, Linton and Cresswell. {Inns and Social Clubs. There is one Inn in Lynemouth. There are two Social Clubs in Lynemouth and one in Ellington Colliery. The Social Club in the village which is also known as the Institute, provides a variety of entertainment. These
